channel.title: Pleas help make start.sh link
channel.description:
Hello guys, anyone can help my made server launch link windows bat link to start.sh for Centos 5 VPS 32bit. Bat link:
@echo off title server : Running "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_51\bin\java.exe" -server -Xmx1024m -cp ./jython.jar;/MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar -classpath bin;lib/* com.rs.worldserver.Server release gui pause

item.title: Pleas help make start.sh link
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Unix also uses : instead of ; for the lib separators.

Read full topic

item.title: Pleas help make start.sh link
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“RUNE-PK, post:2, topic:540754”][quote author=hitmenx39 link=topic=659620.msg4411057#msg4411057 date=1393690643]
Hello guys, anyone can help my made server launch link windows bat link to start.sh for Centos 5 VPS 32bit.

Bat link:

@echo off
title server : Running
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_51\bin\java.exe" -server -Xmx1024m -cp ./jython.jar;/MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar -classpath bin;lib/* com.rs.worldserver.Server release gui
pause

This is how I did it http://tldp.org/LDP/abs/html/dosbatch.html
[/quote][/quote]As usual you comment not helping!

OP all you have to do is keep line 3, and instead of referencing the direct java path just use “java”.

Read full topic
